specialTipSize.specialTip: $0, unlike other Abnormalities, produces energy depending on the amount of NE-Boxes, with simultaneously generated NE-Boxes being used and PE-Boxes being discarded.
When the work result was Good, the Qliphoth Counter increased, then the employee who completes the work will be influenced by $0. (From then on, the employee will be referred to as O-01-73-1.)
T-06-237-SP-1 will benefit from increased SP and Temperance stat. However, the increased value will reduce by time when there are other employees in the same area.
When the work result was Bad, the Qliphoth Counter decreased, then the employee will take a certain amount of B damage.
Once the Qliphoth Counter reaches 0, every T-06-237-SP-1 would feel like ████████。
